Approx. 420 shots (LCD monitor on)

Approx. 400 min. (Playback)
construction: 14 elements in 10 groups,L-series lens (1 Fluorite, 1 UD glass & 2 aspherical elements)

High Speed at approx. 2.5 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 6 images)
Normal at approx. 1.0 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 18 images)²

external flash: E-TTL with EX series Speedlites, wireless multi-flash support

(1) Recording Menu

speed:
15 – 1/4,000 sec
